long_description: Built for travel and warm-weather adventures, the Merrell Ophelia Shirt is made from an easy-care, breathable stretch fabric with wicking underarm and side panels to keep you dry. Stretchy polyester, treated with Merrell Opti-Wick(TM), moves moisture away from your skin and accelerates the evaporation process. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. 1 hidden zippered security pocket and 2 chest pockets. Shell buttons on front placket. Closeout.
short_description: Built for travel and warm-weather adventures, the Merrell Ophelia Shirt is made from an easy-care, breathable stretch fabric with wicking underarm and side panels to keep you dry.
